first_para: Rowenna Davis (born 28 February 1985) is a British author, journalist, political commentator and former Labour Party councillor in Peckham. She was selected on 14 July 2013 as the Labour Prospective Parliamentary Candidate for the highly marginal seat of Southampton Itchen for the 2015 general election.

full.extract: Rowenna Davis (born 28 February 1985) is a British author, journalist, political commentator and former Labour Party councillor in Peckham. She was selected on 14 July 2013 as the Labour Prospective Parliamentary Candidate for the highly marginal seat of Southampton Itchen for the 2015 general election.
full.title: Rowenna Davis
